properties.Description: The properties of the connected registry.

systemData.Description: Metadata pertaining to creation and last modification of the resource.

mode.Description: The mode of the connected registry resource that indicates the permissions of the registry.

version.Description: The current version of ACR runtime on the connected registry.

connectionState.Description: The current connection state of the connected registry.

lastActivityTime.Description: The last activity time of the connected registry.

activation.Description: The activation properties of the connected registry.

parent.Description: The parent of the connected registry.

clientTokenIds.Description: The list of the ACR token resource IDs used to authenticate clients to the connected registry.

loginServer.Description: The login server properties of the connected registry.

logging.Description: The logging properties of the connected registry.

statusDetails.Description: The list of current statuses of the connected registry.

notificationsList.Description: The list of notifications subscription information for the connected registry.

status.Description: The activation status of the connected registry.

id.Description: The resource ID of the parent to which the connected registry will be associated.

syncProperties.Description: The sync properties of the connected registry with its parent.

tokenId.Description: The resource ID of the ACR token used to authenticate the connected registry to its parent during sync.

schedule.Description: The cron expression indicating the schedule that the connected registry will sync with its parent.

syncWindow.Description: The time window during which sync is enabled for each schedule occurrence. Specify the duration using the format P[n]Y[n]M[n]DT[n]H[n]M[n]S as per ISO8601.

messageTtl.Description: The period of time for which a message is available to sync before it is expired. Specify the duration using the format P[n]Y[n]M[n]DT[n]H[n]M[n]S as per ISO8601.

lastSyncTime.Description: The last time a sync occurred between the connected registry and its parent.

gatewayEndpoint.Description: The gateway endpoint used by the connected registry to communicate with its parent.

host.Description: The host of the connected registry. Can be FQDN or IP.

tls.Description: The TLS properties of the connected registry login server.

status.Description: Indicates whether HTTPS is enabled for the login server.

certificate.Description: The certificate used to configure HTTPS for the login server.

location.Description: Indicates the location of the certificates.

logLevel.Description: The verbosity of logs persisted on the connected registry.

auditLogStatus.Description: Indicates whether audit logs are enabled on the connected registry.

type.Description: The component of the connected registry corresponding to the status.

correlationId.Description: The correlation ID of the status.

createdBy.Description: The identity that created the resource.

createdByType.Description: The type of identity that created the resource.

lastModifiedBy.Description: The identity that last modified the resource.

lastModifiedByType.Description: The type of identity that last modified the resource.

location.Description: The location of the export pipeline.

identity.Description: The identity of the export pipeline.

properties.Description: The properties of the export pipeline.

systemData.Description: Metadata pertaining to creation and last modification of the resource.

principalId.Description: The principal ID of resource identity.

userAssignedIdentities.Description:
The list of user identities associated with the resource. The user identity 
dictionary key references will be ARM resource ids in the form: 
'/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/
    providers/Microsoft.ManagedIdentity/userAssignedIdentities/{identityName}'.

principalId.Description: The principal id of user assigned identity.

clientId.Description: The client id of user assigned identity.

target.Description: The target properties of the export pipeline.

options.Description: The list of all options configured for the pipeline.

provisioningState.Description: The provisioning state of the pipeline at the time the operation was called.

type.Description: The type of target for the export pipeline.

uri.Description:
The target uri of the export pipeline.
When 'AzureStorageBlob': "https://accountName.blob.core.windows.net/containerName/blobName"
When 'AzureStorageBlobContainer':  "https://accountName.blob.core.windows.net/containerName"

keyVaultUri.Description: They key vault secret uri to obtain the target storage SAS token.

sku.Description: The SKU of the container registry.

identity.Description: The identity of the container registry.

properties.Description: The properties of the container registry.

location.Description: The location of the resource. This cannot be changed after the resource is created.

systemData.Description: Metadata pertaining to creation and last modification of the resource.

name.Description: The SKU name of the container registry. Required for registry creation.

tier.Description: The SKU tier based on the SKU name.

loginServer.Description: The URL that can be used to log into the container registry.

creationDate.Description: The creation date of the container registry in ISO8601 format.

provisioningState.Description: The provisioning state of the container registry at the time the operation was called.

status.Description: The status of the container registry at the time the operation was called.

adminUserEnabled.Description: The value that indicates whether the admin user is enabled.

networkRuleSet.Description: The network rule set for a container registry.

policies.Description: The policies for a container registry.

encryption.Description: The encryption settings of container registry.

dataEndpointEnabled.Description: Enable a single data endpoint per region for serving data.

dataEndpointHostNames.Description: List of host names that will serve data when dataEndpointEnabled is true.

privateEndpointConnections.Description: List of private endpoint connections for a container registry.

publicNetworkAccess.Description: Whether or not public network access is allowed for the container registry.

networkRuleBypassOptions.Description: Whether to allow trusted Azure services to access a network restricted registry.

zoneRedundancy.Description: Whether or not zone redundancy is enabled for this container registry

anonymousPullEnabled.Description: Enables registry-wide pull from unauthenticated clients.

displayStatus.Description: The short label for the status.

message.Description: The detailed message for the status, including alerts and error messages.

timestamp.Description: The timestamp when the status was changed to the current value.

defaultAction.Description: The default action of allow or deny when no other rules match.

action.Description: The action of virtual network rule.

id.Description: Resource ID of a subnet, for example: /subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/Microsoft.Network/virtualNetworks/{vnetName}/subnets/{subnetName}.

action.Description: The action of IP ACL rule.

value.Description: Specifies the IP or IP range in CIDR format. Only IPV4 address is allowed.

quarantinePolicy.Description: The quarantine policy for a container registry.

trustPolicy.Description: The content trust policy for a container registry.

retentionPolicy.Description: The retention policy for a container registry.

exportPolicy.Description: The export policy for a container registry.

status.Description: The value that indicates whether the policy is enabled or not.
The value that indicates whether the policy is enabled or not.

days.Description: The number of days to retain an untagged manifest after which it gets purged.

lastUpdatedTime.Description: The timestamp when the policy was last updated.

status.Description: The value that indicates whether the policy is enabled or not.
The value that indicates whether the policy is enabled or not.
Indicates whether or not the encryption is enabled for container registry.

keyIdentifier.Description: Key vault uri to access the encryption key.

versionedKeyIdentifier.Description: The fully qualified key identifier that includes the version of the key that is actually used for encryption.

identity.Description: The client id of the identity which will be used to access key vault.

keyRotationEnabled.Description: Auto key rotation status for a CMK enabled registry.

lastKeyRotationTimestamp.Description: Timestamp of the last successful key rotation.

properties.Description: The properties of a private endpoint connection.

systemData.Description: Metadata pertaining to creation and last modification of the resource.

privateLinkServiceConnectionState.Description: A collection of information about the state of the connection between service consumer and provider.

provisioningState.Description: The provisioning state of private endpoint connection resource.

id.Description: This is private endpoint resource created with Microsoft.Network resource provider.

status.Description: The private link service connection status.

description.Description: The description for connection status. For example if connection is rejected it can indicate reason for rejection.

actionsRequired.Description: A message indicating if changes on the service provider require any updates on the consumer.

location.Description: The location of the import pipeline.

identity.Description: The identity of the import pipeline.

properties.Description: The properties of the import pipeline.

systemData.Description: Metadata pertaining to creation and last modification of the resource.

source.Description: The source properties of the import pipeline.

trigger.Description: The properties that describe the trigger of the import pipeline.

options.Description: The list of all options configured for the pipeline.

provisioningState.Description: The provisioning state of the pipeline at the time the operation was called.

type.Description: The type of source for the import pipeline.

uri.Description:
The source uri of the import pipeline.
When 'AzureStorageBlob': "https://accountName.blob.core.windows.net/containerName/blobName"
When 'AzureStorageBlobContainer': "https://accountName.blob.core.windows.net/containerName"

keyVaultUri.Description: They key vault secret uri to obtain the source storage SAS token.

sourceTrigger.Description: The source trigger properties of the pipeline.

status.Description: The current status of the source trigger.

properties.Description: The properties of a pipeline run.

systemData.Description: Metadata pertaining to creation and last modification of the resource.

provisioningState.Description: The provisioning state of a pipeline run.

request.Description: The request parameters for a pipeline run.

response.Description: The response of a pipeline run.

forceUpdateTag.Description: How the pipeline run should be forced to recreate even if the pipeline run configuration has not changed.

pipelineResourceId.Description: The resource ID of the pipeline to run.

artifacts.Description:
List of source artifacts to be transferred by the pipeline. 
Specify an image by repository ('hello-world'). This will use the 'latest' tag.
Specify an image by tag ('hello-world:latest').
Specify an image by sha256-based manifest digest ('hello-world@sha256:abc123').

source.Description: The source properties of the pipeline run.

target.Description: The target properties of the pipeline run.

catalogDigest.Description: The digest of the tar used to transfer the artifacts.

status.Description: The current status of the pipeline run.

importedArtifacts.Description: The artifacts imported in the pipeline run.

progress.Description: The current progress of the copy operation.

startTime.Description: The time the pipeline run started.

finishTime.Description: The time the pipeline run finished.

source.Description: The source of the pipeline run.

target.Description: The target of the pipeline run.

catalogDigest.Description: The digest of the tar used to transfer the artifacts.

trigger.Description: The trigger that caused the pipeline run.

pipelineRunErrorMessage.Description: The detailed error message for the pipeline run in the case of failure.

percentage.Description: The percentage complete of the copy operation.

sourceTrigger.Description: The source trigger that caused the pipeline run.

timestamp.Description: The timestamp when the source update happened.

properties.Description: The properties of a private endpoint connection.

systemData.Description: Metadata pertaining to creation and last modification of the resource.

location.Description: The location of the resource. This cannot be changed after the resource is created.

systemData.Description: Metadata pertaining to creation and last modification of the resource.

provisioningState.Description: The provisioning state of the replication at the time the operation was called.

status.Description: The status of the replication at the time the operation was called.

regionEndpointEnabled.Description: Specifies whether the replication's regional endpoint is enabled. Requests will not be routed to a replication whose regional endpoint is disabled, however its data will continue to be synced with other replications.

zoneRedundancy.Description: Whether or not zone redundancy is enabled for this container registry replication

properties.Description: The properties of the scope map.

systemData.Description: Metadata pertaining to creation and last modification of the resource.

description.Description: The user friendly description of the scope map.

type.Description: The type of the scope map. E.g. BuildIn scope map.

creationDate.Description: The creation date of scope map.

actions.Description:
The list of scoped permissions for registry artifacts.
E.g. repositories/repository-name/content/read,
repositories/repository-name/metadata/write

systemData.Description: Metadata pertaining to creation and last modification of the resource.

creationDate.Description: The creation date of scope map.

scopeMapId.Description: The resource ID of the scope map to which the token will be associated with.

credentials.Description: The credentials that can be used for authenticating the token.

status.Description: The status of the token example enabled or disabled.

expiry.Description: The expiry datetime of the certificate.

encodedPemCertificate.Description: Base 64 encoded string of the public certificate1 in PEM format that will be used for authenticating the token.

creationTime.Description: The creation datetime of the password.

expiry.Description: The expiry datetime of the password.

location.Description: The location of the webhook. This cannot be changed after the resource is created.

properties.Description: The properties that the webhook will be created with.

systemData.Description: Metadata pertaining to creation and last modification of the resource.

serviceUri.Description: The service URI for the webhook to post notifications.

customHeaders.Description: Custom headers that will be added to the webhook notifications.

status.Description: The status of the webhook at the time the operation was called.

scope.Description: The scope of repositories where the event can be triggered. For example, 'foo:*' means events for all tags under repository 'foo'. 'foo:bar' means events for 'foo:bar' only. 'foo' is equivalent to 'foo:latest'. Empty means all events.

actions.Description: The list of actions that trigger the webhook to post notifications.

provisioningState.Description: The provisioning state of the webhook at the time the operation was called.

username.Description: The username for a container registry.

passwords.Description: The list of passwords for a container registry.

value.Description: The list of events. Since this list may be incomplete, the nextLink field should be used to request the next list of events.

nextLink.Description: The URI that can be used to request the next list of events.

eventRequestMessage.Description: The event request message sent to the service URI.

eventResponseMessage.Description: The event response message received from the service URI.

content.Description: The content of the event request message.

headers.Description: The headers of the event request message.

method.Description: The HTTP method used to send the event request message.

requestUri.Description: The URI used to send the event request message.

timestamp.Description: The time at which the event occurred.

action.Description: The action that encompasses the provided event.

request.Description: The request that generated the event.

actor.Description: The agent that initiated the event. For most situations, this could be from the authorization context of the request.

source.Description: The registry node that generated the event. Put differently, while the actor initiates the event, the source generates it.

mediaType.Description: The MIME type of the referenced object.

size.Description: The number of bytes of the content. Same as Length field.

digest.Description: The digest of the content, as defined by the Registry V2 HTTP API Specification.

length.Description: The number of bytes of the content. Same as Size field.

url.Description: The direct URL to the content.

id.Description: The ID of the request that initiated the event.

addr.Description: The IP or hostname and possibly port of the client connection that initiated the event. This is the RemoteAddr from the standard http request.

host.Description: The externally accessible hostname of the registry instance, as specified by the http host header on incoming requests.

method.Description: The request method that generated the event.

useragent.Description: The user agent header of the request.

name.Description: The subject or username associated with the request context that generated the event.

addr.Description: The IP or hostname and the port of the registry node that generated the event. Generally, this will be resolved by os.Hostname() along with the running port.

instanceID.Description: The running instance of an application. Changes after each restart.

content.Description: The content of the event response message.

headers.Description: The headers of the event response message.

reasonPhrase.Description: The reason phrase of the event response message.

statusCode.Description: The status code of the event response message.
